import React, {Component, useState} from 'react'; import { Button, Popover, PopoverHeader, PopoverBody, Container } from 'reactstrap'; import Java from './images/java.png'; import Node from './images/nodejs.png'; import Reacts from './images/reactjs.png'; import CPP from './images/cpp.png'; import SQL from './images/postsql.png'; import Carousel from 'react-bootstrap/Carousel'; import Jumbotron from 'react-bootstrap/Jumbotron'; import Hitchcock from './images/hitchcock.png'; import TABot from './images/TABot.png'; class Projects extends Component { render(){ return( /*

Hitchcock

A Script that uses the IMDB API to get information on any movie that is entered.

TABot

Teaching Assisstant Bot, TABot, is a work in progress python script that uses light ML concepts to help in developing a person's Computer SCience skills.

Fluid jumbotron

Third slide label

Praesent commodo cursus magna, vel scelerisque nisl consectetur.

 */ Card Title Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content. Cras justo odio Dapibus ac facilisis in Vestibulum at eros Card Link Another Link ) } } export default Projects;
